fields.description:
FACE MOISTURISER WITH HONEY

Main ingredients

Healing organic shea butter
Organic Rosehip oil
Hydrating organic jojoba oil
Hand harvest honey

fields.name: BODY BALM WITH BEESWAX
fields.description:
Description
This luxurious balm is suitable for all skin types. Hypo allergenic and a perfect choice for sensitive skin, this balm bursts with goodness. Fortified with soothing beeswax and healing organic shea butter and organic sweet almond oil which contains over 90% unsaturated fatty acids which seal in moisture and restore normal skin barrier function. Vitamins A, B and E provide potent anti-oxidants in abundance. This body balm with beeswax offers outstanding rehydration and protection for delicate skin.

Awarded a silver medal in the Free From Skincare Awards London U.K 2018

 

It is unscented so suitable for the most sensitive skin.

Enriching
Soothing
Healing
Directions for use:

For the most effective results apply a small amount to your hands after your bath or shower while skin is still warm. Gently massage the balm into the skin. Use circular movements to encourage good blood circulation.

Ingredients: Organic Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Organic Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus  Dulcis), Organic Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Organic Coconut Oil (Virus Vinifera),  Beeswax (Cera Alba), Vitamin E (Tocopherol).

I am always working towards been fully Eco Friendly using eco-friendly materials for shipping and working towards all containers and packing been fully environmentally friendly

Advice: This is a natural product so bee-careful and keep out of direct sunlight or anywhere that may be too warm.

***Allergy Alert***

fields.name: CLEANSING OIL WITH BEESWAX
fields.description:
This Cleansing Oil has been formulated for people of all ages. It provides your skin with bee-goodness keeping your skin nourished soften and hydrated whilst cleansing your skin. With super power organic avocado oil ,rosemary extract and healing beeswax this soothing cleanser has the power to remove your make-up as well as gently lift the daily grime.

Cleansing your skin is the most important step in your skincare routine. Using a cleansing oil removes make up and other impurities on your skin while leaving it feel moisturised.

Double cleansing with hot cloth.

Apply a small amount to the palm of your hand massage into your face and neck remove with a muslin cloth which has been rinsed out in hot water, repeat the process to ensure that your skin is super clean and leaving it feeling refreshed hydrated and Bee-Fabulous

Designed to be used with our organic muslin cloth.

Use with our organic muslin cloth.

Ingredients
*Helianthus annuus ,*Persea gratissima,
*Glycina Soya, Cera Alba, Rosemarinus officinalis, Tocopherol, *Organic

Beeswax blended with organic plant oils it is perfect for protecting sensitive dry skin especially chronically dry conditions such as eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis.

Unscented

Wash your hands for 20 seconds to ensure it is done correctly

fields.name: BEESWAX PILLAR CANDLE
fields.description:
These elegant, tall, hand rolled beeswax candles add uncompromising finesse to wherever they are placed. Perfect for a dinner table, or on a mirrored mantelpiece, you will fall in love with the blissfully relaxing light and deliciously natural scents.

 

Beeswax Candles

Contains Two Candles

Handmade in Ireland this Beeswax Candle is totally pure and natural.

Cotton wicks

 

Size

Burning Time 6/7 hrs each

Suitable to fit in a Tealight Holder

 

Did You Know

 

People with allergies, sinus problems and asthma have reported significant improvement in their symptoms, breathing better and sleeping better after burning a Pure Beeswax Candle in their bedroom 2/3 hours before going to bed.

 

Burning times are approximate and depend on temperature, humidity and other ambient conditions,do not light candle where there is a draught, it is a natural product and it will affect it’s burning time. Designed and handmade by Trish in Dunhill Ecopark, Dunhill, Co.Waterford Warning: Take all  wrappings off candle before lighting and as always care has to be taken with a lighting candle at all time especially with children and pets.

fields.name: BEESWAX CANDLES  DUO
fields.description:
Handmade by Trish 3rd generation beekeeper.

Trish takes the product from the hive to the home.

fields.name: BEESWAX CANDLES small
fields.description:
These candles are hand-rolled using 100% beeswax and cotton wicks. Beeswax candles produce a beautiful warm glow and have a natural subtle scent.
 

Beeswax Candles

Two Candles

 size 35mm x 65mm

Burning Time 5/6 hrs each


Did You Know

 
People with allergies, sinus problems and asthma have reported significant improvement in their symptoms, breathing better and sleeping better after burning a Pure Beeswax Candle in their bedroom 2/3 hours before going to bed.

 

Burning times are approximate and depend on temperature, humidity and other ambient conditions,do not light candle where there is a draught, it is a natural product and it will affect it’s burning time. Designed and handmade by Trish in Dunhill Ecopark, Dunhill, Co.Waterford, Ireland

 Warning: Take all  wrappings off candle before lighting and as always care has to be taken with a lighting candle at all time especially with children and pets

fields.name: VEGAN BREAD WRAP
fields.description:
The bread wrap is sized to fit a loaf of bread, keeping bread soft and fresh for longer. By switching to vegan wraps, you will save money, reduce plastic waste and help save the environment!

Contains 1 Vegan Bread wrap (35 x 55cm)

fields.name: Vegan SANDWICH WRAP
fields.description:
Perfect for wrapping up sandwiches and snacks to enjoy on the go for school, work or for outdoor adventures and picnics. By switching to vegan wraps, you will save money, reduce plastic waste and help save the environment!

Contains 1 Maxi wrap (35 x 35cm with button and string).

fields.name: VEGAN FOOD WRAPS – Medium
fields.description:
A perfect choice for packing kids’ lunches for school, or wrapping small to medium sized items like cheese, crackers, fruits, and leftovers. It’s ideal for use in the kitchen or on the go.

Contains 2 Midi wraps (25 x 25cm) and 1 Mini wrap (20 x 20cm)

fields.name: VEGAN FOOD WRAPS – Large
fields.description:
A great starter pack, containing one each of the mini, midi and maxi wraps. It’s perfect for use in the kitchen or on the go. By switching to vegan wraps, you will save money, reduce plastic waste and help save the environment!

Contains 1 Maxi wrap (35 x 35cm), 1 Midi wrap (25 x 25cm) and 1 Mini wrap (20 x 20cm)
